languages.text: "Любопытно. Внутри него душа, не так ли? Интересно, можно ли заставить ее страдать... Дам тебе за него самого ловкого и смекалистого из моих Ревущих. Тебе ведь сейчас не помешает умелый боец?"
"Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"
languages.original_text: "Любопытно. Внутри него душа, не так ли? Интересно, можно ли заставить ее страдать... Дам тебе за него самого ловкого и смекалистого из моих Ревущих. Тебе ведь сейчас не помешает умелый боец?"

traits.locale_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

languages.text: “真有趣，里面有个灵魂，是吧？不知道能不能让它受苦……我可以拿我最强悍、最凶狠的尖啸者和你换。一位出色的战士会派上用场的，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

traits.locale_text: “真有趣，里面有个灵魂，是吧？不知道能不能让它受苦……我可以拿我最强悍、最凶狠的尖啸者和你换。一位出色的战士会派上用场的，你说呢？”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Interesante. Hay un alma dentro, ¿verdad? Me pregunto si es posible hacer que sufra... Te daré a mi Aullador más hábil y astuto. Te vendría bien un guerrero decente, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

traits.locale_text: «Interesante. Hay un alma dentro, ¿verdad? Me pregunto si es posible hacer que sufra... Te daré a mi Aullador más hábil y astuto. Te vendría bien un guerrero decente, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「面白い。その中に魂が閉じ込められているのだろう？苦難を与えることはできるだろうか…そいつと引き換えにもっとも腕の立つ切れ者のシュリーカーをやろう。戦士がいれば心強いだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

traits.locale_text: 「面白い。その中に魂が閉じ込められているのだろう？苦難を与えることはできるだろうか…そいつと引き換えにもっとも腕の立つ切れ者のシュリーカーをやろう。戦士がいれば心強いだろう？」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Interessant. Es steckt eine Seele darin, nicht wahr? Ob man sie wohl leiden lassen kann ... Ich gebe Euch dafür meinen fähigsten und gerissensten Kreischer. Ihr könntet doch einen ordentlichen Kämpfer brauchen, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Interessant. Es steckt eine Seele darin, nicht wahr? Ob man sie wohl leiden lassen kann ... Ich gebe Euch dafür meinen fähigsten und gerissensten Kreischer. Ihr könntet doch einen ordentlichen Kämpfer brauchen, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Intéressant. Il y a une âme à l'intérieur, non ? Je me demande s'il est possible de la faire souffrir... Je vous ferai don de mon Hurleur le plus doué et le plus rusé en échange. Vous ne diriez pas non à un bon combattant, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant. Il y a une âme à l'intérieur, non ? Je me demande s'il est possible de la faire souffrir... Je vous ferai don de mon Hurleur le plus doué et le plus rusé en échange. Vous ne diriez pas non à un bon combattant, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "İlginç. İçinde ruh var, değil mi? Buna acı çektirebilir miyim ki... Taşı verirsen en becerikli ve akıllı Çığırtkanım senindir. İyi bir savaşçıya hayır demezsin ya?"
languages.original_text: "Interesting. There's a soul inside, right? I wonder if it's possible to make it suffer... I'll give you my most skilled and savvy Shrieker for it. You could do with a decent fighter, right?"

traits.locale_text: "İlginç. Bir ruh var içinde, değil mi? Acaba acı çektirmek mümkün müdür buna... Taşı verirsen en becerikli ve akıllı Çığırtkanım senindir. İşine yarar mı?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
